name: Ecommerse- Shop.co
description: Designed and developed the frontend of an e-commerce platform using Vue.js and Sass, integrating the Fake Store API to fetch product data and building all key pages to deliver a smooth, user-friendly experience.

name: React dashboard
description: Developed an interactive React dashboard using Material UI, featuring dynamic charts, responsive layouts, and intuitive navigation for streamlined data visualization and management.

name: Business Page
description: Created a responsive business landing page using Vue.js and Bootstrap, featuring a clean layout, smooth navigation, and optimized design for seamless user engagement across devices.

name: Memory Game
description: Built a fun and engaging memory game using Vue.js, featuring dynamic card flipping, match tracking, and responsive design for smooth gameplay across devices.

name: Diabetes Risk Prediction
description: Developed a machine learning model to predict diabetes risk based on health indicators, leveraging data preprocessing, feature selection, and classification algorithms to deliver accurate and actionable insights.

name: Drunk Level Classifier
description: Developed a Drunk Level Classifier using a Vision Transformer (CvT) and machine learning, converting RGB images to infrared-style visuals to accurately predict sobriety or drunkenness.
